website_summaries.verdict: Specifically made for printing from iPhones. Will create small prints in as fast as 30 seconds.
pros: Makes use of ZINK printing technology, which means it doesn't require ink cartridges
Very small instant printer that's easy to carry with you
The iPhone fits directly into the printer, meaning as soon as you snap a photo, it begins printing
Convenient to use this printer if you own an iPhone
cons: Will not work with non-iPhone smartphones or with any tablets, even iPads

customer_reviews.title: Worst product and service ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Prynt Pocket a few months ago, and the product was deficient. So I had to return it and purchased a new one. Everything was fine with this one, but recently all my photos are printed with two back lines on them. I have tried to contact Customer Support from Prynt but no one has replied to me. Customer service is a nightmare. In the meantime, I am stuck with this product and cannot even return it. Extremely unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prynt Pocket is fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried using the Prynt Pocket, I was a little confused on how to adjust it to my phone size and how to load in the photo paper, but then the little manual that comes inside the box helped me out. I opened up my Prynt app and there were more instructions that were more clear on how to use the Prynt Pocket. Now, it's so simple for me to use and I love printing out lots of photos with my Pocket! The photo paper is also about 50 cents a piece so it's a lot cheaper than Polaroid.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other Zink printers on the market, I chose this one for the originality. The shutter button and the clamp mechanism to hold the phone make it feel like a vintage camera. Using the app, the setup is easy even though there is quite a few steps to follow before printing your first picture. The print quality is decent for this kind of printer. It's instant photography after all. I was asked by the app to update the printer and the quality seemed better after that. I hope that more updates like will come! Overall I like this product because even though it's not perfect it brings something new and fun to your photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and the app is very easy to use with lots of helplful tips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 11 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it and the app is very easy to use with lots of helplful tips. The picture quality comes out looking great and I love that the cost per picture is much more affordable vs. the mini polaroid. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Me+Three

customer_reviews.title: A Modern-Day Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: The Prynt Pocket is the perfect modern-day Polaroid! I love that I can take photos and print them instantly. And as a scrapbooker, the fact that the photos are also stickers makes everything so much easier. I can also use my phone like a photo booth, taking photos then giving them out to friends on the spot! It's so much more convenient to have the Prynt Pocket on hand than waiting to order prints from Snapfish or a similar site. I also highly recommend their unlimited paper plan if you plan to print at least 100 photos in the next six months!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great Photo Priinter
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the iphone 6. It has lighting plug so this will work with any iphone that has type of phone. The printer expands to size. Works great. At first, you think it doesn't fit, but the device expands. All you do is download the app, drop your phone in and print. My daughter has been having so much fun and giving everyone pictures from her phone. It won't fit in a wristlet, but it does fit in small purse. Very handy for kids to have when they are hanging out with the friends. It's like having your own personal photo booth. The pictures that come out are wallet size.
customer_reviews.author: beanie

customer_reviews.title: As expected: It's a fun gadget
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun, nifty gadget but the quality of the print is only decent. It's portable with a few personalizing functions you can do (scribble, text, red eye removal etc) so the selection is limited. It's more of a fun toy than a quality printer, as I expected it was going to be
customer_reviews.author: Lillian C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I can get my iPhone pictures in print without shaking like a Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: This a cool new device. I supported their first Kickstarter campaign and I appreciate the updated more compact version. The app is easy to use. I wish I could use it with my case on. It is a hazzle to take off my super tight case every time I need to use it. When I use it, people are very impressed by the device and smile at getting the picture. I recommend if you like to see your iPhone pics in print... (no pun intended, lol)
customer_reviews.author: JaNai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Printing on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Really Nice printer. It is really portable and prints good quality pictures on the go. One thing that fascinates me, is Harry Potter style. Pictures can hold related videos, which can be seen through their app. I can mail a postcard to anyone. It can be a good gift. Now I really want to buy one for my mom, as it reminds her of Polaroid camera but with new technology and things. Pro's 1. Really fast printing on the go. 2. I can add text to the picture. 3. I can add videos to the picture and relive whenever I want. 4. Can be the great gift to parents. 5. Fits on iPhone with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Karanbir Singh

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have really high hope for this item. It is very easy to use. All the functions are indeed very cool. However, the color is very bad. Pictures turn out badly and don’t look like real. I will need to return
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: The device was super easy to use and the instructions and accompanying app ...
customer_reviews.text: The device was super easy to use and the instructions and accompanying app were very clear. It only took me a minute to put together all the parts and print a photo. Unfortunately, I wasn't a huge fan of the photo colors themselves. Unlike a Polaroid (where everything is saturated), the colors were darker. I actually liked that they had darker tones, but they came out more cartoon-ish with the outlines being too harsh. It works a lot better for scenery pictures instead of portraits though, and I still would use the product often. Wish there was a way to connect my phone without taking it out of its case though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really expecting this to be an “OK” device. I was pleasantly surprised! I am 57 years old. Usually new tech devises are difficult to make work for me, ( I DO NOT have a grandchild to ask for help...lol) So after all the reviews I decided to try this device. I was pleasantly surprised by the ease and simplicity of this item! I have received many compliments on my photos and am soooo happy with the pictures I can’t express my happiness with this purchase!!! I would recommend this to ANYONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Certainly an easy to use product, convenient and ascetically please but the printed picture quality really isn't what was advertised in my opinion. The colors and quality aren't as dynamic as you'd expect or want your pictures to turn out to be even after all the updates. I love the idea/concept of the app and the moving picture ability via the app. The quality of the videos plays as well as your phone displays which is great but the printed pictures just aren't as nice as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Gasparine

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Prynt device for just a few days, but it's satisfying to be able to press a button and have a real, physical copy of a photo. The photos are smaller than I expected, but I guess I didn't really read the description well. I think this will help me maintain a hard copy record of life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. York

customer_reviews.title: fun & user friendly
customer_reviews.text: We love our Prynt, it's super user friendly and we get heaps of use out of it Actually purchased to use for our wedding Photo Booth as the film was much cheaper than other instant polaroid type film and was a great hit as everyone gets a novelty photo and we can reprint the digital at a later date
customer_reviews.author: Bree Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great printer while out on the go!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for printing your photos on the go! I have used it while out with friends, and everyone has been really impressed with the results. Its way better than having a Polaroid photo, because you have the ability to choose which photo looks the best before printing. Paper is easy to fill, and it lasts a long time while away from a charger. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds - Polaroid and Digital Videos/Photos
customer_reviews.text: I love polaroid cameras but they are usually too bulky. The Prynt pocket is perfect because it is smaller than any polaroid cameras I've owned and still prints great pictures. I had tried the earlier version of the Prynt and I feel like the quality of the pictures printed by this new smaller version is way higher. It basically brings you the best of both worlds, the old fashion photograph that definitely has an analog feel to it, and the little twist with the videos that you can embed in these pictures. It's a very well done product, both the software and the hardware and I'm having a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie Guiraud

customer_reviews.title: Fun product that is easy to use and prints out great pictures! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use is what I love most about the Prynt Pocket. Immediately after opening the box, I downloaded the app and the instructions to operate were very clear. The tutorial is also available if you forget how to operate the first few times. I got the Prynt Pocket in order to hand out these pictures to my friends during a birthday bash in an exotic location. Not only did the picture come out great, but my friends were fighting to keep the pictures. It is rugged, compact, and very practical. All in all, a very fun product that gets the party started!
customer_reviews.author: germain boue

customer_reviews.title: A swing and a miss
customer_reviews.text: It's a neat concept - if you can get it to work. The app is clunky and difficult to use. This was a gift for my parents, who - although somewhat tech-savvy - are not Facebook users ... or they weren't. The app won't process other log-in options. The device is sensitive to paper loading and we struggled to get it to work. The printed pictures are the quality of a Polaroid. Essentially, save your money. It was a very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zella

customer_reviews.title: Really nice polaroid case
customer_reviews.text: It is the first time I am writing a review but I've got to say I am impressed with the product. It is basically a nice little polaroid case for iPhone that comes with an app with surprisingly fun features! Pros: Small Good image quality Augmented reality pictures (think about the pictures in Harry Potter). I love to gift people them as animated postcards! Cons: The pictures are sensible to liquid
customer_reviews.author: Ramy G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but terrible quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is not great, the coloring is completely off but the idea is great. I was surprised at how cheap this felt when I got it especially the paper cartridge. I did get the dreaded blue line but after re calibrating it went away I hope it doesn't come back. My 9 year old loves this and honestly with the quality that is the age range I would anticipate actually using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I am a huge fan of Prynt products and this little guy took me completely by surprise. Works like a charm and fits all iPhones perfectly. I love the cute designs and colors. Can't wait to take it with me on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D. Valentin

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my sister and she is really happy about the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Prynt Pocket as a gift for my sister and she is really happy about the product. I am glad I bought this product rather a polaroid camera for two reasons: she is able to print her previous photos that are stored in her phone + the magic part when your photo comes to life is really really cool!! So far I would definitely recommend this product as a great birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks decent photo quality
customer_reviews.text: The app, idea, and overall structure of this product are very good. It’s excellent product from those standpoints. However, one of the most important things about an instant photo printer is severely lacking with this product: PHOTO QUALITY. In most pictures, the outlines of some shapes will be very noticeable, and the color will be clearly off from the original. This is an easy 5 star product if it were to work correctly, but the company needs to fix their color coding for this product before I’m willing to give them the two stars that this product can have
customer_reviews.author: Alika

customer_reviews.title: Prynt Pocket Review
customer_reviews.text: Fairly satisfied with this product. They picture quality is what you would expect for a pocket printer, but the photos don't look as crisp as what is advertised on the prynt website. This is great if you need pictures for scrap-booking or journaling. Sometimes I have issues and it will say it is not connected to my phone. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this camera. I followed the instructions in the box, used the tutorial videos on the website, and the Q and A section. The camera will not connect to my IPhone 6. I have redownloaded the app, reset the camera and everything else the company recommended I do and it still does not connect. Huge waste of money and now I can’t return it even though it does not work. Be weary of buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A cute little printer that delivers surprises.
customer_reviews.text: This printer is really fun to use. It connects to my iPhone like a charm. The photo has vibrant color and the filter that comes with the app makes the photo look really nice. I wish the photo is a big bigger but you can't get both portable-size photo printer and large size photo at the same time. I like the fact that the printer comes with 20 sheets of photo paper so I don't have to buy extra photo paper upfront.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zhang

customer_reviews.title: This is the best portable printer ever!!!!!! Even after 6 months of usage.
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this, 6 months back I felt a little disappointed with the picture quality but now after few updates to the app I am getting excellent Picture Quality. This printer works with Zink technology paper. This printer adds fun to the pictures like never before Augmented reality experience. I have seen many updates gone through in the app which improves picture quality. You won't regret this purchase, Just wait for prime day or thanksgiving for the sale.
customer_reviews.author: MR7 Prime

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently small
customer_reviews.text: It adjusts to fit any iphone width no matter the case as long as you have the lightning charging port. The app also tells you what you printed and how much battery the printer has. It's really light too so you can take it with you anywhere without a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-La Keiki

customer_reviews.title: that sucks and I don’t know what to do
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Prynt pocket for quite a lot of pictures.. over 100... and at some point it started giving me messages saying that there is an error with the case.. after putting case in and out it stared saying print one photo at a time.. so I put one sheet - still nothing.. that sucks and I don’t know what to do!!!! I need to print 40 more pics!!! Help!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so fun and adorable! This is the perfect gift for anyone with an iPhone. I got this, the case, and a bunch of sticker photo paper, and my grandma uses it to print little pictures of her whole family and stick them to her fridge haha.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The print quality on this device is sub-par. Don't waste your money. All images print blotchy. We tried printing several photos, went through the recommended cleaning and calibration process three times as well. But to no avail. My 18 month old is more capable of producing a better quality hand drawn image, and that's not saying much...
customer_reviews.author: raanan schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money and a gift for my wife. Don't buy it, it's lame.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures look like cartoons and they don't get better with use. Photo paper is expensive as well. In al I give it a stay away and find a Polaroid Camera from when I was a child.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Basteri

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the iPhone - perfect for finding an ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the iPhone - perfect for finding an answer to my grandmother's complaints that every time I show her a picture on my phone, she can't have a print of that wonderful selfie. The kit is easy to install but it seems that I can only put one piece of paper at a time to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Anais Moutot

customer_reviews.title: Fun little product
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is fun! However print quality could be better, picture tend to come out darker than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Hamel

customer_reviews.title: I am really satisfied! The camera is super cute and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My Prynt Pocket arrived today : I am really satisfied ! The camera is super cute and lightweight.The sticky back of the paper is super usefull, but the best is the “scan feature”. You can embed a video into a physical picture, so if you scan it you will watch a video, I just love it !
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Ok but.....not good
customer_reviews.text: The device overall is ok but first I expected a zoom wheel as shown in all YouTube videos but mine didn’t have one then the picture quality is so bad it’s ok but red instead of a green building dark dark blue instead of sky blue, it is not very nice. For what it is it’s ok but I’d recommend to just get a politics if I was you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an early Xmas gift for my daughter. She likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this today, plugged my phone in and then took pictures! I didn't even realize that when you put the printed picture in front of the screen and tap it, it animates!! This is the coolest thing - can't wait to take it to a party.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry. Let everyone take some souvenirs home with them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Prynt right before a Bachelorette Party. We had so much fun with it during the weekend, it really added to the experience to save memories in short videos. And everyone left with some souvenirs right away, starting with the bride to be! We absolutely loved the product and I'm now using it on a regular basis with friends and family. I find the refill very easy to do, charge lasts long and the Prynt pocket is easy to carry. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Clem V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to share moment
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to share immediately in print with family and friends. Fun to stick pictures on phones, backpacks, mirrors, etc to have the memory in view all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: It looks easy enough but when you add photo paper one little crinkle and it won't work. I tried different ways, different sheets, one sheet and still nothing. Got frustrated and gave up. They have tried to be helpful but it's the same old instructions that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Yelton

customer_reviews.title: Print Quality isn't as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It took a little bit to get it set up and start printing and once I did, I was disappointed in how dark the pictures came out. Also, they weren't as crisp as they normally print out on standard film. I've been trying to figure out how to fix this, but haven't been successful yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tianne Patten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The photo quality at the first tries are not that great but still like making my family members video photos to make them tripping balls/confusing them.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: It's not the most amazing quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nieces. One had printed about 30 pictures by the time I left their house. It's not the most amazing quality pictures, but it's a really fun and easy printer to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT - Great Product and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing about a year and a half ago, and I have no complaints about it! The app is simple and easy to use, and it has a reward program. The more you print out, the more points you get that can be redeemed for more printer paper and such! I've used this with an iPhone 6s Plus and an iPhone X, both fit perfectly and never wobbled around. The battery lasts forever. I use it for hours at a time, and don't have to recharge it every session. Prynt staff is friendly and is an overall great startup company. I recommend this product 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Oz Rinkliff

customer_reviews.title: Is not compatible with iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy! Says works with all iPhones. My daughter and wrapped it for her birthday and has an iPhone eight. Does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Prynt Pocket a few weeks back to make it easier to create color hardcopies of photos I take while documenting projects and builds. I ended up Prynt'ing tons of photos of my dog and friends, and posting them everywhere and giving them away. :) The app was really easy to setup, easy to calibrate, very intuitive, and I've had no issues getting paper, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BoardGameFan

customer_reviews.title: but it’s still fun for printing lil pictures
customer_reviews.text: Neat little printer. Sometimes the photos come out a bit dark with the color slightly distorted, but it’s still fun for printing lil pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Candie Web

customer_reviews.title: Photos were nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Got it as a gift for my sister and she really enjoyed taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.text: don't really know! It was a Chrismas gift to my daughter-in-law
customer_reviews.author: JOHN HOHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. It works on my IPhone X S Max
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! Bought for my daughter and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Bought for my daughter and she loves it. You can take pictures and see them in motion just like it said you can. So many great memories can be captured with this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Sebrina

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn't print out pictures as nice as advertised. Wish I could have returned, but it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gharechedaghy

customer_reviews.title: Fun Device for Pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's a really fun device to use. It has a great set of easy to use instructions. The pictures come out nicely and are easy to display.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to print pictures right away and give them to my friends. The quality of picture is good and prints quickly. Set up was easy too. It's also fun showing all my friends the videos behind each pic.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lankin

customer_reviews.title: this little gadget is so cool and prints great quality pics
customer_reviews.text: this little gadget is so cool and prints great quality pics. it's like the old polaroid but you can stick the pictures anywhere. love it!!! now please release the android version :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But other pics are pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the colors are off sometimes. My picture of green cabbage printed out yellow. But other pics are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynn434

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun product! Guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun product! Guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face. I tried it out on my coworker who is a graphic designer and she was overjoyed. It's a creative way to capture memories!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inovative product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for more than a month now. It is more than expected. It is super interesting when you can take the picture and also save the dynamic films..... When I showed it to my friends, they all liked it ! It is a perfect gift for different occasions: parties, birthday, special moment... Highly Recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: You will like this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like and appreciate this! The picture quality isn’t as good as I thought it’d be, but all in all, good product!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Satcher

customer_reviews.title: Oldest daughter loves stickers and pics
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter received this as Xmas gift n she loves it. Especially the fact that the pics r stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Kinser

customer_reviews.title: So cool and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Just like a Polaroid camera but better. Great $60, spent. One of my favorite mothers days gifts ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No ink required!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Prynt! I use it in my planner. I can slip it in my purse and go. Great quality photos! And no ink needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B.

customer_reviews.title: ... pictures look but it is a very handy and easy to use printer
customer_reviews.text: The pictures come out a little darker than the original pictures look but it is a very handy and easy to use printer. Light-weighted and easy to carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: Tore L.

customer_reviews.title: Broken product??
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but when I open the package, it was just the product. No bubble wrap or paper. It could be broken and if so I wasted 120 for this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon2019

customer_reviews.title: Great invention.  I must get another one
customer_reviews.text: Coolest Gadget. Easy to set up. I couldn't stop playing & printing with it. I felt like a child with a brand new toy. Hope they'll make one that prints out in a 3X5 size one day.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to bring along during a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to bring along during a day trip or a vacation to take pictures on the spot. The instructions were very clear and got me snapping just after opening the package. The package comes with paper and ink but I recommend buying sticker paper.
customer_reviews.author: William Dumesnil

customer_reviews.title: MOST HAVE PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!! MY WIFE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT!!!! THE VIDEO PICTURES ARE PRETTY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: That cartridge won’t fit in printer
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the paper cartridge to go into the printer. Tried for hours and no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Make the Investment into the new Prynt Pocket!
customer_reviews.text: Being in San Francisco, it is relatively difficult to impress your friends with tech. I have the GoPro 5, Snapchat Spectacles, but this has got to be my favorite gadget. It is extremely easy to use, setup and the output is immediately tangible. This is great for road trips, company outings, brunch and any other group activity. My friends call it the "Harry Potter Printer". The feature that makes this amazing and better than any other polaroid out there is the augmented reality with the video. It is a static image that comes to life if you hover over it.
customer_reviews.author: Saagar Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a couple months don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy only worked for a couple moths and now all my prints have horizontal black lines going through them smh
customer_reviews.author: Anthony velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied, would 100% recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice idea! Printing the pictures is nice and the scan function is even better :)! it makes great memories. I also love being able to send postcards. The packaging and the interface are both very cool too. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Camille

customer_reviews.title: Order extra print papers when ordered unit
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this works and is awesome. Just make sure you have good lighting. Some dark photos may be a tad blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Salesprice

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT, BUT PAPER DOESN'T FIT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I'm just disappointed that it came with the wrong size Zink paper. The wrapper isn't English, so I don't know if these sheets are even meant for the Prynt Pocket. Luckily I bought an extra box of 40 sheets to go with it or else I would not be able to use this at all this weekend on my camping trip! I would still like the 10 Zink sheets that are supposed to come with this though, especially since replacement sheets are expensive and I paid a lot of money for this. Other than that, I love this awesome little contraption! Definitely a product for millenials with the app's photo editing and social media features!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use but the print quality is not that good

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this

customer_reviews.author: anjuli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sharing photos via snail-mail.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Prynt Pocket to send photos to several older friends and loved ones that don't use email or other online communication. The photos are the perfect size to include in standard notes and envelopes without adding to the cost of postage, are excellent quality, and the paper is inexpensive enough that recipients can enjoy the pictures and then discard them if they wish. I love the convenience. My iPhone 6 with case fits perfectly -- this company is amazing in their customer-centric approach to continuous improvement.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Took it out today to print something for my son in ICU thinking that I would do something nice because he can't have flowers in there
customer_reviews.text: I used it once, charged it and put it away in its case that it came in. Took it out today to print something for my son in ICU thinking that I would do something nice because he can't have flowers in there. Plugged it in to charge it. When I unplugged it, it broke! Now, I know that you are probably thinking that something else must of happened in-between the first time and the second time. It just broke. Wow!

customer_reviews.title: I have bought Polaroid cameras before and they can be ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Polaroid cameras before and they can be difficult to use while being bulky to carry around. This device works wonders and I am now able to have Polaroid pictures in a convenient, efficient manner.

customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Perfect gift for the fam. Easy to use just record yourself and then watch it come to life on the prynt out.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and fun product !
customer_reviews.text: What really impressed me is that is very easy to use ! Everything is in the box and the apps uses videos to show you how to set up your camera. I installed my pocket on my phone and printed my first photo in less than 10 minutes ! I also really like the graphic design or the pocket as well as the app, and it's very small so easy to bring with you for a trip or vacation. The only thing I think could be improved is the quality of the photos when applying a filter from the app... I recommend it, it can be a very fun present !

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup and use right away
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Prynt Pocket as a gift for my daughter. She loves it - It's compact, easy to setup and use right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its an interesting toy but not a fan of the response of company and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and the print paper posted next to it by Amazon, Print, 2x3 ZINK sticker paper, the paper did not fit in the instant printer and I had to cut it to fit in the printer. When I contacted Print Pocket they said that it is not the correct paper! seems odd that the paper is sold with the printer. The package I have had to have at least a 1/16th or more cut off. If they are selling paper for their product they should specify the paper to use and then have a place to order that paper. Its an interesting toy but not a fan of the response of company and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Pleak

customer_reviews.title: but besides that it is great!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures have a yellowish tint on it, but besides that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kierra' McDowell

product_meta.title: Prynt Pocket, Instant Photo Printer for iPhone - Graphite (PW310001-DG)
product_meta.description:
Color:Graphite| Style:Base

The Prynt Pocket turns your iPhone into a palm-sized instant camera. Print any photo saved to your phone or favorite social networks, anywhere. But there's more. The Prynt app enables you to add a video inside your photo. When you share your Prynt photo with friends, they can use the Prynt app to unlock the video clip, magically bringing your Prynt photo to life!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Prynt Any Photo Instantly Print any photo from your camera roll or social networks - or shoot in real time. The Prynt app allows you to choose photos directly from Instagram, Snapchat and your camera roll. Watch the phone print in seconds with one simple tap.

Embed a Video to Make Your Photo Come to Life Prynt uses augmented reality to make your photo come to life. The Prynt app gives you the option to add a video inside your photos. Hold the Prynt app over your photos and watch as it comes to life! 




Step 1: Take a photo with the Prynt app, followed by a short video. It’s a great way to include a surprise message or story. You can also choose to print from your camera roll or social networks.

Step 2: Apply filters and frames, adjust lighting and add text to your photos. 

Step 3: Print your photo in seconds with one simple tap. Plus, they're stickers!




Prynt Pocket is the easiest way to transform your phone into a palm-sized instant camera Are you ready for a new photo experience?




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Incredible instant photos. 

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We started working on Prynt during our last semester of college, inspired by the idea of combining something tangible with something digital. Turning your smartphone into a Polaroid seemed just crazy and cool enough to work. 

What makes your product special?

Prynt is the first photo-printing case for your phone, and it lets you share more than just an instant by saving a video inside of your Prynt photo. We designed Prynt in Paris with an emphasis on an authentic camera experience that’s integrates seamlessly with your phone. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Building a team and watching the people that have joined us develop. We are also really proud of the diversity in our team; because everyone brings a different point of view, we are able to be even more creative as a company.
feature_bullets: Turn your iPhone into an instant camera ½ the size of the original Prynt Case, with an easy-to-remove paper cartridge
Print photos from your phone (even Instagram), or take new ones- printed in 30 seconds
Add a video to your Prynt and watch it come to life with the app
No ink necessary- photos are printed directly onto ZINK (zero ink) Sticker Paper- the only photo paper compatible with Prynt Pocket

Peel off the adhesive backing to turn any photo into a sticker! Compatible with the Apple iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone SE, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5
